entry.content:
Hi! I'm Aura Candy 

123

Wanna watch me live?  

See my twitter >> 

Hi! I'm Aura Candy
Wanna watch me live?
See my twitter >>

Hi! Yeah, I'm Aura Candy
I'm a broadcaster on that adult website - Chaturbate. As by now i mainly appear on Twitter and Chaturbate. Grab the link to my live broadcast on my Twitter. When i broadcast? Whenever. What i broadcast? Whatever. If you bookmark this page and come back later there might be something new. One day. Thanks for checking my personal page out! If you want to see my twitter, it's @EyeCandyAura
Questions Answered
How do i know you're online?
Follow me on Chaturbate - you'll get notified when i'm online. As for my schedule - i'm still figuring it out.
Where do i watch you for free?
Watching my broadcast is free on Chaturbate.
How do i get a recording of your broadcast?
Hop in on Chaturbate when i broadcast and request a private show - you get my private show saved automatically in your 'my collection' which you can access by clicking on your username on top right.
How do i know if you do stuff i like in a private show?
Visit me when i'm online and ask a question in a tip note, in a private message or if you're ok with that in public chat, if it's active.
Are custom requests private show only?
Mostly they are but a lot of requests i do in a public show just ask me when i'm live.
